editorialNotes.short: Get game highlights, team stats and post-game recaps.

editorialNotes.standard: With comprehensive live coverage of international matches, T20 leagues and major domestic tournaments, Cricbuzz is your go-to-guide for everything that happens on the cricket field. Quickly access live scores, news and match stats from Notification Center and even follow ball by ball commentary on your Apple Watch.

editorialNotes.standard: Regardless of what sports you follow, stay in the loop with up-to-the-minute scores, breaking news on signings and trades, and insightful analysis on matchups and drafts.

editorialNotes.standard: The MLB app really does knock it out of the park. Preview the day’s matchups, buy tickets to a game, and follow along via live pitch tracking and high-resolution ballpark renderings.

editorialNotes.standard: It’s a social network for anglers, packed to the, uh, gills with tips on local hot spots, advice on bait and gear, and even the ability to ID any fish you’ve caught simply by snapping a photo of it.

editorialNotes.short: Visualize and plan your round before you play.
editorialNotes.tagline: Visualize and plan before you play

editorialNotes.short: Create a fantasy team with friends and get the most out of game day.
editorialNotes.standard: If you want to play fantasy sports, there are—ahem—leagues of apps to choose from. But we think ESPN Fantasy might be the MVP. Its minimal interface stays out of our way so we can focus on draft picks, trades, and managing our lineup. But the best part? ESPN’s got mini-stories on all of the hot prospects. So the more time we spend actually using the app, the better our team ends up.

editorialNotes.tagline: Get all the news and scores
editorialNotes.standard: The ultimate app for any football fan, NFL Mobile offers an insanely robust experience from the preseason to the playoffs. A smartly designed interface puts the spotlight on colorful photos and videos, and breaking news is easy to navigate and share. The astoundingly long list of features includes drive charts, real-time scores, and live stat trackers. Plus, on-demand games, access to preseason games, and more all become available with purchase of the NFL Game Pass 2016 Subscription, so there’s always something new to watch, analyze, and read.
